title: Wife Inheritence: Mark & Cissy have been married for over 20 years
content:
Cissy and Mark have been married for over 20 years. Unfortunately early this year, Mark died in a boda boda accident. During the burial, Mark's relatives said that since they had paid bride price for Cissy, she belongs to them and as a result, the relatives have taken her away as a third wife to Ken, Mark’s younger brother. Cissy was unhappy about the whole situation and has run away back to her parent’s home.[T1]
